Jan. 30, 1954 D Wigan Contest
Wigan Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wigan Contest wigan-contest
Test Piece Contest
Bianca e Fernando
Drill Hall, Powell Street, Wigan Hymn tune 1st Leigh B.., Best soprano, euphonium and cornet. Best horn and trombone. Youngest player Keith Bancroft (Eagley Mills). 1st annual contest promoted by Haigh Band.
March 11, 2013, 12:18 p.m. May 18, 2015, 9:32 a.m.
